name: JustBecause
0:
”Alexa, open Just Because”
”Alexa, start Just Because”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: just because
des: Celebrate special occasions with your loved ones. Just Because is a great greeting card due to the fact that it can be used for a million and one reasons. Anyone in your life that you care for can get a Just Because card and make their day. When you open the skill, Alexa will play a slideshow with rich images and audio. You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
